long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What will NetSpy - Spy Call app do for you

This fast paced upgraded software will allow you to monitor the overall activities on the desired phone. Once you download and install Net Spy on any Android or iOS device, you can easily perform the surveillance task through detecting their calls, time duration, getting the details of the people with whom they have been conversing with, along with accessing their address book. This fully fledged application not only allows you to check out the behavior of your family members but can also prove beneficial to your employees.

Access the call history and contact book- with the latest technological features of NetSpy app; you can easily access the overall details stored on the target phone. You can check out details like call history and details of contacts stored in their address book. This feature can ultimately help you to find out the culprit as you can easily dig out the person with whom your partner or your children are talking to. You can even determine their public profile and can find out whether that person is suitable to stay in connection or not. Now you partner can no longer cheat on you because all his contact details will turn out to be in your hands within minutes.
